title: Live Debugging Node.js With Docker
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use Docker and Visual Studio Code to develop and debug a Node.js application without having Node.js installed locally.

meta.title: Node.js Debugging | Docker | Visual Studio Code
meta.description: Discover how to use Docker and Visual Studio Code for Node.js debugging without installing Node.js on your machine. Learn about a simple application with an error and how to set up the development environment.
meta.keywords: Node.js, Docker, Visual Studio Code, Debugging, Development Environment
